author: danj
msg: Applying patch for MUSE-261 - thanks Kevin!

author: proyal
msg: DIRMINA-431 - Test and fixes. Keep track of when the session is opened in VmPipeFC to ensure proper event ordering. Use a re-entrant lock, so we can try and lock, and put in data queue if we can't.

author: proyal
msg: Make boolean volatile to avoid synchronization on reads. Remove unnecessary read synchronization. Found as part of DIRMINA-431

author: danj
msg: Fix for MUSE-255 - make sure SG entry is actually deleted from the system after removing its artifacts from the SG implementation

author: proyal
msg: DIRMINA-429 and DIRMINA-430 - The SocketSessionImpl keeps track of whether or not it is in the flush queue, removing the need to check the size of its write request queue. Also have the SocketSessionImpl keep track of the # of outstanding bytes-to-be-written in an AtomicInteger.
